overview: Nick Marsh is currently a venture partner at FirstMark, contributing his experience as a serial entrepreneur in the sector. He co-founded Xando which became Cosi, Inc. (NASDAQ: COSI) where he served as President and COO, ultimately growing the business to more than one hundred locations. Nick is an active investor and serves as Executive Chairman at Chopâ€™t Creative Salad Company, Mendocino Farms Sandwich Market and Allcoast Media, the largest online community for saltwater fishing.
